Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
light-haired \light-haired\ adj. being or having light colored skin and hair; as, a certain light-haired girl. Contrasted to {brunet}. [Narrower terms: {redheaded}]
Syn: blond, blonde. [WordNet 1.5]
redheaded adj : having red hair and usually fair skin
